reviewText: Dont buy this censored Chinese bulls#$t!!! Its not even close to the original movie that I saw on Netflix a ways back!!! Try to find a copy thats made in the USA and uncensored!!! Cause this says uncut, but is extremely cut and censored!!!

I think everyone in US knows that how fast the Chinese ecconomy gets going and how fansinating the country is? This movie is all about the normal Chinese people from countrysude living in a big cosmopolitan Beijing and the rich people, the poor people....
After I saw this movie. I feel this is a very good, very real.(No wonder it's banned in China because the controversal story and it has a lot of nudity scene- you didn't know Fan Bingbing is a big big star in China and is considered one of the most beuatiful woman in China).
After I saw this movie, I think Bingbing Fan not just the most beautiful woman in China and she is really a good actress.
I have been to this kind of foot massage place when I was in Beijing. So after I saw this movie -wow, I said this movie is so real- I'm sure this drama happened in real life.
